mapper.select: SELECT c.CHAT_NO, c.MEMBER_ID, c.CHAT_CONTENT, c.CREATE_DATE, m.MEMBER_NICKNAME as nickname FROM CHAT_MESSAGE c JOIN TB_MEMBER m ON c.MEMBER_ID = m.MEMBER_ID WHERE c.CREATE_DATE >= SYSDATE - 3 ORDER BY c.CREATE_DATE ASC
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM CHAT_MESSAGE WHERE CREATE_DATE < SYSDATE - 3
